approvals.title: Cover v5 - Premium Redesign (White-Black-White Layout)
approvals.description: Premium covers with exact white-black-white color scheme and professional typography. Version A: Classic Business (serif). Version B: Swiss Minimal (sans-serif). Both use proper premium fonts and clean layouts.

brandAlternatives.title: Pure Minimal (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Clean flat cream, gold accent line, navy block. Zero texture, pure Swiss design minimalism.

brandAlternatives.title: Subtle Geometric (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Faint intersecting lines in cream section. Gold accent, navy block. Premium stationery feel.

brandAlternatives.title: Soft Organic (Nano Banana)
brandAlternatives.description: Natural paper grain texture, warm organic feel. Gold accent, navy block.

completedItems.title: Dashboard Deep Fixup — Layout Rebuild
completedItems.description: Complete layout overhaul: removed broken tabs, replaced kanban with collapsible project cards, fixed data flow, updated status.json, auto-deploys on push.

completedItems.title: Gmail OAuth Token Fix
completedItems.description: Fixed expired OAuth token via manual auth flow. Token exchanged and imported. Recommended publishing OAuth app to production to prevent 7-day expiry.

completedItems.title: Cloudflare Pages GitHub Auto-Deploy Enabled
completedItems.description: Yaakov recreated Pages project with GitHub integration. Auto-builds enabled on push to main. No more manual wrangler deploys needed.

completedItems.title: 5-Hour Implementation Sprint Complete
completedItems.description: Above-fold input layout, time-based activity levels, email capture foundation, mobile optimization, SEO foundation.

completedItems.title: Build Protocol Skill Complete
completedItems.description: 4-phase gated workflow: Discovery, PRD, Architecture, Build. Quality-scoped research, batched Q&A, diagnostic error recovery.

completedItems.title: ProjectCalc Competitive Deep Dive
completedItems.description: Analyzed Calculator.net, NerdWallet, Bankrate. Inputs above fold critical. Programmatic SEO drives 690k+/mo. Affiliate = $379M/yr.
